Campus Safety

Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
Campus security is always nearby each building.
Honorary society.
Various clubs and activities i.e. choir, dance, theatre, ODP.
Great for outgoing, time managers, and students wishing to improve themselves.
Basic campus as far as any others I have seen.
Excellent quality for the rate of tuition. Knowledgeable staff. There is also a child development center for students with children.
There are films, shows, musicals, festivals, etc students can partake in. Tickets for local venues are also offered at discounted rates.
There are a variety of food and dining shops nearby (within walking distance). There are also vending machines located in the buildings.
No dorm life available. All students reside off campus.
It is up to the students to stay on task and prioritize their time. Remember to set aside a little time each day to do schoolwork.

Research the offered academic plans before enrolling in classes. Enroll in a variety of courses so you can see what truly interests you while focusing on what you desire. Utilize the offered tutoring and counseling. Do not be afraid to change your major once you realize you like something else.
Great learning atmosphere. Educated staff willing to assist students with issues and concerns. Affordable tuition rates.
pageTitle: Tidewater Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {169572=Tidewater Community College is located in the heart of downtown with a variety of options for food. The Students Center just opened in the summer of 2011 and is a wonderful option for students who dont want to walk too far from campus to grab a bite to eat., 202317=Currently unavailable, but will be availalbe by March 2014., 127255=The Norfolk Campus Tidewater community college was the first campus to have a student center it open on May 23,2011 that is a place were students can hang out in between classes it has five floors . The first floor is open to the public which has two cafes on that floor . The other floors can only be access if you are a tcc student with an tcc id card which is provide by the school once you are enrolled into classess., 401654=TCC doesn't have a dorm because it is a community college. TCC offers day-care starting in the beginning of January or February. Also they offer employment for students that want to work part-time while they are in school., 538154=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 130464=Hello prospective students i use to be open of you but then I was at the beach and I was thinking i do not just want a high school diploma because that will not get me very far in life. So on March 2,2011 i decide to enroll into school and that was the best thing i did so far in my life.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot So far, all but two of my teachers that I have had were wonderful. If you are majoring in sociology or Microsoft Office I would research your teachers hard before signing up for your classes. Login to rate or flag the reviews Kristin from ASTORIA, NY 02/07/2013 Reviewer is A past student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 136 Categories Comments Great for these types of students First year students who are either not sure of what career path they want to choose. Older students who have taken a break and have to work while going to school can have their choice of night classes. Any student that has to pay for college themselves and is seeking to save a little money. Bang for the buck The low cost based off the fact that it is a community college is very convenient.
